title: Jenkins and Jonez - Game 7 Reactions, Finals Thoughts, and Summer Short Lengths
itunes:title: Jenkins and Jonez - Game 7 Reactions, Finals Thoughts, and Summer Short Lengths
description:
The guys discuss the dramatic Game 7 between the Celtics and Heat, how they view Jimmy Butler, and their early thoughts on the Finals matchup, before discussing how long is the right length for shorts and why it’s a Taco Bell summer. #Herd

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
